data.title: Apple Employee Perks & Benefits
data.meta_description: Apple's benefits package is estimated to be valued at $15,066 per employee. This includes Insurance, Health & Wellness, Home, Financial & Retirement, Perks & Discounts, Transportation, and Other benefits. View all the benefit programs, plans, and coverage.
